tier3.name: Life Drain
tier3.passive_ability: Killing an enemy minion restores 3% of max HP.

tier3.name: Open Fire
tier3.passive_ability: Dealing damage with skills increases physical attack by 5% for 3 seconds. This skill has a 6 second cooldown.

tier3.name: Energy Absorption
tier3.passive_ability: Killing an enemy minion restores 2% of max HP and 3% of max MP

tier3.name: Magic Power Surge
tier3.passive_ability: Dealing damage with skills increases magic attack by 11~25 (increases with hero level) for 3 seconds. This effect has a 6 second cooldown.

tier3.name: Tenacity
tier3.passive_ability: Increase physical and magical defense by 35 points when health is less than 40%.

tier3.name: Brave Smite
tier3.passive_ability: Crowd controlling an enemy restores 5% of max HP. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

tier3.name: Attack and Defense
tier3.passive_ability: Increase physical and magical attack by 0.4% of max HP.

tier3.name: Veteran Hunter
tier3.passive_ability: Killing jungle monsters hit by Retribution grants 50 extra gold.

tier3.name: Wild Power
tier3.passive_ability: Retribution’s slow effect increased by 20%. Gain 50 extra gold if an enemy dies under Retribution effect.

tier3.name: Mage Killer
tier3.passive_ability: Increases damage dealt to the Lord, Turtle, and Turrets by 15%. Reduce damage taken from the Lord and Turtle by 20%.

tier3.name: Bounty Hunter
tier3.passive_ability: Gain an extra 100 gold from killing enemy hero (Up to 1300 gold).

tier3.name: High and Dry
tier3.passive_ability: Increases damage by 6% on the enemy hero when there is no other heroes nearby.

tier3.name: Killing Spree
tier3.passive_ability: Killing an enemy hero restore 15% HP and increase movement speed by 20% for 5 second.

tier3.name: Mystery Shop
tier3.passive_ability: Reduce the gold cost of gears to 90%.

tier3.name: Magic Worship
tier3.passive_ability: When dealing damage that is more than 7% of target's max HP for 3 times in 5 seconds, burns the target 3 times, each burn dealing 82-250 magic damage. This effect has 12 second cooldown.

tier3.name: Impure Rage
tier3.passive_ability: Damaging enemies with skills will deal an extra damage equal to 4% of the target's current HP as magic damage, and restore 3% of your Mana. This effect has 5 second cooldown.

tier3.name: Unbending Will
tier3.passive_ability: Increases damage by 0.2% for every 1% HP lost (up to 12%).

tier3.name: Festival of Blood
tier3.passive_ability: Gains 8% Spell Vamp. Killing an enemy hero grants an extra 1% Spell Vamp (up to 12%). This effect has 10 second cooldown.

tier3.name: Disabling Strike
tier3.passive_ability: Slowing enemy by 20% or more in single instance will increase physical attact by 30%. The effect will end after dealing damage or after 3 second.

tier3.name: Focusing Mark
tier3.passive_ability: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, damage dealt by allies on the same enemy hero will be increased by 6% for 3 second. This effect has 6 second cooldown.

tier3.name: Avarice
tier3.passive_ability: Gains an extra 10 gold after dealing damage to enemy heroes (up to 1200 gold). This effect has 4 second cooldown.

tier3.name: Pull Yourself Together
tier3.passive_ability: Resurrecting time and battle spell cooldown is reduced by 15%.

tier3.name: Weapon Master
tier3.passive_ability: Physical damage gained from equipment is increased by 10%

tier3.name: Electro Flash
tier3.passive_ability: Within 1.5s of dealing damage with Basic Attacks, increases movement speed by 40% and regenerates HP equal to 30% of hero's Physical Attack. This effect has 10s cooldown.

tier3.name: Weakness Finder
tier3.passive_ability: Basic Attack has a 20% chance of reducing target's movement speed by 90% and attack speed by 50%. This effect has a 2 second cooldown. (Not effective for melee heroes)
